content: उल्ब(ल्व)ण {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Thick, clotted, copious, abundant (blood &c.); °रुधिरं <ls>Mv. 6. 33.</ls> {@--2@} Much, excessive, intense; <ls>Śi. 10. 54</ls>, <ls n="Śi. 10.">68</ls>, <ls n="Śi.">12. 37</ls>; <ls>Ku. 7. 84.</ls> {@--3@} Strong, powerful, great; <ls>Śi. 20. 41</ls>; °रसः <ls>U. 5. 26</ls> the heroic sentiment; <ls>Dk. 23</ls>, <ls n="Dk.">25</ls>; <ls>K. 299</ls>, <ls n="K.">302.</ls> {@--4@} Manifest, clear; तस्यासीदुल्बणो मार्गः <ls>R. 4. 33.</ls> {@--5@} Gaudy, showy; अनुल्बणवेषेण <ls>K. 66.</ls> --णं {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} Much, heavily (as sighing).
